column2:
"Haha, as I thought!
If I ask you like this, you'll accept
my request!"

"Sorry to take advantage of your kindness like this,
but you're the only one I can count on these days.
I mean, this will be a tough one!"

"You know those D-arkers they call El Ardas?
The ones over in the Lost Sea?"

"I hear they've got an amazing symbol I could use
as a decoration for my party. I absolutely need
this to make the mood just right!"

"I hate to have to rely on you so much, but...
I'm counting on you!"

"ふふっ、やっぱり！
貴方はこういう風にお願いすれば
受けてくれると思ってた！"

"親切心を利用しちゃったようでゴメン！
でも、これは貴方にしか頼めない
大変そうな事だったからさ。"

"砂漠によくいるエル・アーダって
ダーカー、わかる？"

"あいつがイイ感じのシンボルを
持っているらしいんだ。
ぜひぜひ、集めてきてほしいの！"

"貴方ばかりに頼んでごめんなさい！
よろしくねっ！"
